column3: Googled ‘Vietnamese coffee’ nearby and walked to Hong Kee & Kim, only to find out they’re permanently closed. Thankfully so, otherwise I wouldn’t have found this gem! The coffee is powerful and rich in flavor. I can’t stand black coffee and this mix added the perfect amount of sweetness— not overbearing or too watered down. I’ll be ending my Starbucks trips for iced blonde lattes because this is tastier and actually wakes me up. The best part of the experience was meeting Chai! Easily one of the best first impressions ever. Chai is very bubbly and charming! His infectious energy brightened my day, even my coworkers noticed the energy shift. All smiles and laughs! Thank you!
Love that they give you the option of bread for the type of sandwich you want! Freshly made!

I got thai boba tea. And I found out this on my drink. I went back their and tell the manager. He offered me another drink, of course I dont want get any drink from here anymore. The thing is the manager didnt even say Sorry. So, disappointed

Not recommended. They up charge for everything and very rarely does the price on the board equal what you pay.  It would be fine if they overcharged for good food, but, quality is generally lacking and the flavor is bland.
Went there for a smoothie and it was the best smoothie I’ve had will keep coming back staff is really nice. No problems at all great place
Hot  sandwich  BBQ pork & beef......😠 My  Sandwich  not hot enough  only like  microwave heat up.....👎👎
Coffee and cake. What more can you ask for! You must try the cheesecake.  Oh, and the Service is awesome!
Love this place!! Awesome food and healthy as well 😊 …
Ice Cold Chicken and Rice... Be careful about the meat, the chicken was not fresh.
Bubble tea is super overpriced and just average quality. Didn't try the food.
I just threw away my burnt and stale cheese bagel purchase from this place.
BBQ Pork Chops over rice is good!
People were nice and food was great.
Meals include Tange Burger and Soup.
